Welcome to Darkhan Rising. An industrial revolution is brewing in the west. The songs of chaos are sounding in the republic... and you... you find yourself on a train in the middle of the end of the world.

The 7 Great Nations of Orox

  1. Darkhan

    The birthplace & homeland of the Darkhan Empire. Centuries ago the hordes of Darkhan roamed theses lands terrorizing the inhabitants. Today the Darkhan Empires sprawls across multiple peoples and landmasses. It's influence rivals that of the Zuros Republic.

    The Empire is the last standing contender in the political war against the wizards of Zuros. The have spent their time focusing on industry, conquering the nations nearest to them (the scraps left behind from the Zuros Republic), and planning their expansion of influence into the contentested nation of Ardon.

    • Slight cultural influence from anciet Mongolia
    • Art-Deco architecture
    • Very industrialized
    • Human-centric
    Capital: Darkhan City

  2. Zuros

    The home of the Republic of Zuros.

  3. Fjoll

  4. Kide

  5. Ardon

  6. Thorval

    A free nation for Warlocks and Worshipers alike. Many god fearing peoples were ostricied from society during the Mage Crusades centuries ago. Under the protection of the Darkhan Empire, Thorval was formed. Thorval is a hub for worshipers of all kinds. You can find a temple for just about everyone here and somehow the peace remains.

    Locations

        Dunadal
        The hub city of the Drow. When the Zuros mages were on their quest for power, the Drow were often cast aside. While all of Elven kind can trace thier origins to Fjoll in some way, they drow have had a hard time finding their place in the world. Shortly after the creation of the Free Nation of Thorval, Dunadal was formed deep beneath the city of dieties.
